Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Recursively copy a directory's contents to another location (if the destination exists, the directory is copied inside it)
Top-3 Scripts:
au_823623: #!/bin/sh

find . -maxdepth 1 -name \*.old -type f -printf "deleting %P\n" -delete
find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -printf "copying %P to %P.old\n" -exec cp '{}' '{}.old' \;

-exec cp
